Today in Sutherland, there's a solid 5 ft @10s N swell with fresh 15 mph N winds. Good spots like Melvich and Strathy are working, especially during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @9s N with light southerly winds, making for fun conditions at various beaches. Day after, expect a bit more action with a 4 ft @11s WNW swell and similar southerly winds, keeping it lively at Melvich and Strathy. Best: day after.
